example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 个))) (NP (NN 岛国))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 高)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 山))) (CC 与) (NP (DNP (NP (PN 她)) (DEG 的)) (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最)) (VP (VA 大)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 城市)))) (VP (VP (VV 相依为伴)) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 互)) (VP (VC 为) (VP (VV 辉映))))))
